author: MrDRamos
body: Add feature to move the IP (instr pointer) to another instruction and tell the program to resume there. I use this in C# all the time. Step over a method look for a bug, notice that the method returned null when I wasn't expecting it to. Then I set the next statement to execute up to the method I just had called and then I step into the method, see: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/y740d9d3.aspx#Anchor_4
title: Add Debug feature to set the next line to execute
